mapper.select: select id, user_id as "userId", name, description, column_layout as "columnLayout", shared, is_global, created_at as "createdAt", updated_at as "updatedAt" from dashboards WHERE name=#{id} and user_id is null
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dashboards (user_id, name, description, column_layout, shared, is_global, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{columnLayout}, #{shared}, #{global}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
